attributes.action: allow men over 60 to claim a state pension as women are allowed to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we men live shorter lives in general than women do - many of us , particularly the
men without pensionable or earning female partners find living costs very high and
we consider the law as it stands is discriminatory and anti- socialist .
afer all - both sexes should be equal in all terms .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
